name: pnp-viva-dev-bot-powered-aces-botpowered-basicace-collect-feedback-ts
title: Collect Feedback Bot Powered ACE with Teams Toolkit
shortDescription: Viva Connection Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) that shows how to collect feedback from users using a Bot-Powered-ACE implemented with Microsoft Teams Toolkit and TypeScript.
longDescription: Viva Connection Adaptive Card Extension (ACE) that shows how to collect feedback from users using a Bot-Powered-ACE implemented with Microsoft Teams Toolkit and TypeScript.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the main CardView to collect feedback from user
Preview of the CardView showing the feedback collected from user
Preview of the main QuickView to show additional information to the user

references.description: Adaptive Card Extensions are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page.
